name: Add Twitter @Anywhere
author: theGOOD

sections.description:
Adds the Twitter @Anywhere JavaScript code to your blog, enabling a few of the @Anywhere features: Hovercards and Auto-linkification of @usernames.

In order to use @Anywhere, you must first register your blog for a free API key with Twitter. You can do so at: http://dev.twitter.com/apps
sections.installation:
1. Upload AddTwitterAnywhere.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your Twitter @Anywhere API key on the ‘Settings’ > ‘Add Twitter @Anywhere’ settings page
sections.faq:
Where can I find more information about Twitter @Anywhere?

http://dev.twitter.com/anywhere

Where do I get a Twitter @Anywhere API key for my blog?

In order to use @Anywhere, you must first register your blog for a free API key with Twitter. You can do so at: http://dev.twitter.com/apps
sections.changelog:
0.1

Initial release. Includes support for Hovercards and Auto-linkification of @usernames.
